summary: Website project with secure admin panel feature
architectural_notes: Admin panel requires authentication with valid credentials
Admin route should be hidden from regular website visitors
Separate access control for admin vs normal users

existing_features.title: Create a hidden admin route at /admin that is not visible in the main navigation menu and is only accessible by direct URL entry
Implement admin authentication using Internet Identity integration that restricts access to the admin panel based on valid admin credentials
Create an admin dashboard page that displays after successful authentication, showing admin-specific functionality and controls

new_feature_requests.summary: Add secure admin panel with authentication and hidden access route
Implement backend authorization checks that verify admin role before allowing access to admin-only operations using the existing role-based access control system
Ensure the admin panel implementation is compatible with and deployable to the current production environment (Version 16)
